name: The Zoo (Modgo)
description:
An adventure game where players can select among  4  different characters to play with.
The game has  4  different levels. 
Final level is a Boss level, where you need to fight against a DRAGON to win the game.
Hope you enjoy it!


How To Play


1) A-D keys or Left-Right keys for movements
2) Space for jump
3) Left click and right click for shooting (shooting will be unlocked in level 2 )
